text: a start-up in San Francisco's soma
neighborhood may soon be rolling out

motors Siwon and Daniel Kim the

urban commuting so basically this is a
fully enclosed self-balancing motorcycle
it has 220 miles per charge zero to 60
in six seconds what makes the vehicle
special is not so much what's under the
hood but what's under the driver's seat
yeah so this is our gyro system each of
these flywheels so around 40 pounds
the driver scopes spin at roughly 7,000
rpm and when all goes well they keep the

stop or in the event of a collision it's
the same technology used to stabilize

so this is really the core technology
for the future and mr. Kim thinks that
it will appeal to urban drivers this
isn't going to replace like the SUV or
